name: Avoid PLC Procedures & Functions with a very low comment/code ratio (PL1)
description:
This rule searches for all the PLC Procedures or Functions having a very low comment/code ratio. PLC Procedures or Functions should have at least a ratio comment/code > X %
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
The report lists all the PLC Procedures and Functions with a very low comment/code ratio.

It provides following information: 
-  PLC Copybooks full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact
remediation: Document your source code in order to keep a  satisfactory comment/code ratio.
total: Number of PLC Procedures and Functions
